title: Hart to Heart
description: We’re the Harts. Between an engagement, a wedding and an adoption, we’ve had the best year of our lives. Things have never looked better for any of us.But just because you say “I do” doesn’t mean you get a happily ever after. And sometimes, you get tackled more in life than you ever did on the football field.The only way we’re going to make it through is if we do it together…Hart to Heart.
author: M.E. Carter
